text: “Choncho tidamuvumbulutsira (mawu akuti): “Panga chombo moyang’aniridwa ndi kudziwitsidwa ndi Ife.” Ndipo lamulo Lathu likadza ndi kufwamphuka madzi mu uvuni, lowetsa mkati mwake (mwa chombocho) chilichonse ziwiriziwiri, chachimuna ndi chachikazi ndi banja lako, kupatula yemwe liwu latsogola pa iye kuti aonongeke mwa iwo. Ndipo usandilankhule za omwe adzichitira (okha) zoipa ndithu iwo amizidwa (m’madzi)
